metadata.title: Distribution of Gas-charged Sediment in Norton Sound and Chirikov Basin, Northeastern Bering Sea

creators.name: M.S. Holmes: U. S. Geological Survey (USGS) 7600 Sand Point Way NE, Seattle, Washington 98115, U.S.A.

metadata.description: To determine the geographic extent and distribution of zones showing anomalous acoustic responses on seismic reflection records from Norton Sound and Chirikov Basin.
metadata.notes:
